main.description: Get a skeleton of suggested actors. Intended to be called and then hydrated through app.bsky.actor.getSuggestions

viewer.description: DID of the account making the request (not included for public/unauthenticated queries). Used to boost followed accounts in ranking.

relativeToDid.description: DID of the account to get suggestions relative to. If not provided, suggestions will be based on the viewer.
DID of the account these suggestions are relative to. If this is returned undefined, suggestions are based on the viewer.

recId.description: Snowflake for this recommendation, use when submitting recommendation events.
